header.title: Make pictures for your project using AI

examples.title: Imagine what you want and create it
examples.description: You can create what suits you best and not worry about copyright. Everything you create will be unique.

firstStep.title: First step
firstStep.description: Decide what you want to create.

secondStep.title: Second step
secondStep.description: Briefly describe your request. The style is already defined, don't worry about it.

thirdStep.title: Third step
thirdStep.description: Download the received image and make the next one! If you are not satisfied with the result, try again. You can also experiment with the query.

about.text: Hello! This pet project was created for training purposes. But I will be glad if it turns out to be useful for someone. If you want to see my other projects or contact me, you can go to my github.
